sentences.sContent: After that, the formalism of statistical mechanics takes over, and calculates partition functions and thermodynamic functions.
sentences.sContent_eng: After that, the formalism of statistical mechanics takes over, and calculates partition functions and thermodynamic functions.
sentences.sCn: 从那以后，都是统计力学的内容，计算配分函数,和热力学函数。

sentences.sContent: That is, in terms of equations of state. For any material Then we would really be able to essentially calculate anything. Anything thermodynamic.
sentences.sContent_eng: That is, in terms of equations of state. For any material Then we would really be able to essentially calculate anything. Anything thermodynamic.
sentences.sCn: 换句话说，利用任何一种物质的状态方程,我们就能够实质上,计算所有物理量，所有热力学量。

sentences.sContent: This must be brought into the picture, along with the performance of thermodynamic work cycles that link spontaneous and non-spontaneous processes like an engine.
sentences.sContent_eng: This must be brought into the picture, along with the performance of thermodynamic work cycles that link spontaneous and non-spontaneous processes like an engine.
sentences.sCn: 这一点必须与热力学功循环的表现一起考虑，热力学连系到自发过程和像发动机那样的非自发过程。

phrases.pCn: 热力学体系；热力学系统

trans.tranCn: 热力学的, 使用热动力的
